body: It's in some of the [`test_autograd.py` tests](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/test/test_autograd.py#L2711) as `torch.Size`. There's some discussion about it in #8520.
body_html: It's in some of the test_autograd.py tests as torch.Size. There's some discussion about it in #8520.
